TASK_EMBEDDING.title: Embedding
TASK_EMBEDDING.instillShortDescription: Generate embeddings based on input data

input.title: Embedding input
input.description: Input schema of the embedding task
input.instillShortDescription: Input schema of the embedding task

model.description: The model to be used for generating embeddings.
model.title: Model Name

image-base64.title: Image base64
image-base64.description: Image content with base64 encoded string.
image-base64.instillShortDescription: Image content with base64 encoded string.

format.title: Data format
format.description: The data format of the embeddings. Defaults to float.

dimensions.title: Dimensions
dimensions.description: Number of dimensions in the output embedding vectors.

input-type.title: Input type
input-type.description: The type of input data to be embedded (e.g., query, document).

truncate.title: Truncate
truncate.description: How to handle inputs longer than the max token length. Defaults to 'End'.

output.title: Embedding output
output.description: Output schema of the embedding task
output.instillShortDescription: Output schema of the embedding task

index.title: Index
index.description: The index of the embedding vector in the array.

created.title: Created
created.description: The Unix timestamp (in seconds) of when the embedding was created.

TASK_CHAT.title: Chat
TASK_CHAT.instillShortDescription: Generate response base on conversation input

input.title: Chat input
input.description: Input schema of the chat task
input.instillShortDescription: Input schema of the chat task

name.description: An optional name for the participant. Provides the model information to differentiate between participants of the same role.
name.instillShortDescription: An optional name for the participant. Provides the model information to differentiate between participants of the same role.
name.title: Role

max-tokens.title: Max new tokens
max-tokens.description: The maximum number of tokens for model to generate
max-tokens.instillShortDescription: The maximum number of tokens for model to generate

n.title: Number of choices
n.description: How many chat completion choices to generate for each input message.
n.instillShortDescription: How many chat completion choices to generate for each input message.

top-p.title: Top P
top-p.description: An alternative to sampling with temperature, called nucleus sampling, where the model considers the results of the tokens with top_p probability mass. So 0.1 means only the tokens comprising the top 10% probability mass are considered. We generally recommend altering this or temperature but not both.

stream.title: Stream
stream.description: If set, partial message deltas will be sent. Tokens will be sent as data-only server-sent events as they become available.
stream.instillShortDescription: If set, partial message deltas will be sent

output.title: Chat output
output.description: Output schema of the chat task
output.instillShortDescription: Output schema of the chat task

finish-reason.title: Finish reason
finish-reason.description: The reason the model stopped generating tokens.
finish-reason.instillShortDescription: The reason the model stopped generating tokens.

index.title: Index
index.description: The index of the choice in the list of choices.
index.instillShortDescription: The index of the choice in the list of choices.

message.title: Message
message.description: A chat message generated by the model.
message.instillShortDescription: A chat message generated by the model.

role.title: Role
role.description: The role of the author of this message.
role.instillShortDescription: The role of the author of this message.

created.title: Created
created.description: The Unix timestamp (in seconds) of when the chat completion was created.
created.instillShortDescription: The Unix timestamp (in seconds) of when the chat completion was created.

completion-tokens.title: Completion tokens
completion-tokens.description: Number of tokens in the generated response.
completion-tokens.instillShortDescription: Number of tokens in the generated response.

prompt-tokens.title: Prompt tokens
prompt-tokens.description: Number of tokens in the prompt.
prompt-tokens.instillShortDescription: Number of tokens in the prompt.

total-tokens.title: Total tokens
total-tokens.description: Total number of tokens used in the request (prompt + completion).
total-tokens.instillShortDescription: Total number of tokens used in the request (prompt + completion).

TASK_TEXT_TO_IMAGE.title: Completion
TASK_TEXT_TO_IMAGE.instillShortDescription: Generate text response base on input

input.title: Completion input
input.description: Input schema of the completion task
input.instillShortDescription: Input schema of the completion task

prompt.title: Input prompt
prompt.description: What you wish to see in the output image. A strong, descriptive prompt that clearly defines elements, colors, and subjects will lead to better results.

aspect-ratio.title: Aspect ratio
aspect-ratio.description: Controls the aspect ratio of the generated image. Defaults to 1:1.
aspect-ratio.instillShortDescription: Controls the aspect ratio of the generated image. Defaults to 1:1.

negative-prompt.title: Aspect ratio
negative-prompt.description: Keywords of what you do not wish to see in the output image.
negative-prompt.instillShortDescription: Keywords of what you do not wish to see in the output image.

n.title: Number of choices
n.description: How many samples to generate for each input prompt.
n.instillShortDescription: How many samples to generate for each input prompt.

output.instillShortDescription: Output schema of the chat task
